page.title: 03LEISURE-TIME VILLAGE GROUPS
page.content: WOMENS'INSTITUTE held in Village Hall; 38 to 40 women members;lectures and social life.Has run for 27 years.For ages 20 years up.They have a CHOIR and cater for coach parties. Friendly,sociable gathering. FRIENDLY CIRCLE is for people over 60; they have visiting speakers, outings and come to school for lunch every Thursday. ROYAL ANTEDILUVIAN ORDER OF THE BUFFALO (RAOB):a Benevolent organisation for men; a nationwide club with strict rules. SUNDAY SCHOOL:a religious gathering for children. BROWNIES:Children 7-10,Village Hall. YOUTH CLUB:Teenagers,Village Hall. COARSE FISHING:4 lakes available;fish caught are pike,carp,roach and tench. VILLAGE FOOTBALL TEAM:young men.
